title: Gala_Apresenta_Maria_Creuza_Vinicius_De_Moraes_Toquini-io_(1979)
description: Gala Apresenta: O Grande Encontro De Maria Creuza/Vinicius De Moraes/Toquini-io Incluindo TambÃƒÂ©m As ParticipaÃƒÂ§ÃƒÂµes De Marilia Medalha E Monsuieto (1979); MP3 192Kbps CBR; Source: Vinyl 33 1/3 12" Long Play disc. I bought this disc in Bauru, Sao Paulo, Brazil in October 1982. While there, I was priviledged to attend a live concert at a University auditorium. The performance began in complete silence with "Tarde Em Itapoan". Several bars into the performance I noticed a sound pervading the theatre, in perfect time, in perfect pitch, never detracting from the stage. When I looked for the sound I noticed that the audience was miming the words of the song. What I experienced was the active participation of the audience, the effect was electrifying.
